headline: PPL to Pay Quarterly Stock Dividend Jul. 1, 2025
summary: PPL Corporation (NYSE: PPL) declared a quarterly common stock dividend on Friday, May 16, 2025, of $0.2725 per share, payable Jul. 1, 2025 to shareowners of record as of Jun.10, 2025.
